name: An Naafi'
description: An Naafi', meaning 'The Benefactor' or 'The One Who Causes Benefit', is one of the names attributed to Allah in Islamic tradition. It signifies God's ability to bring goodness, support, and benefit to His creation.
summary: The name An Naafi' highlights the divine attribute of providing benefits and positive outcomes to the believers and all of creation. It emphasizes God's mercy and generosity, reflecting His role as a source of sustenance and care for humanity and the universe.
